description: Banana bread, that cafe cult classic, is now even easier to enjoy at home, thanks to this 3-ingredient slow cooker recipe. How sweet does that sound?
name: Slow Cooker 3-Ingredient Banana Bread Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Grease and line bowl of a 5.5L slow cooker with baking paper.
Mash bananas in a large bowl with back of a fork until almost smooth. Add milk and stir to combine. Fold in flour. Pour mixture into slow cooker.

Place a clean tea towel over top of bowl, then secure with lid and cook on low for 2 hours or until a skewer inserted in centre comes out clean. Allow to cool for 15 minutes, then slice and serve topped with yoghurt and banana chips.
